name: Manual of me
description:
This is a simple and fun way to help you document your needs, motivations, and skills. It is basically a manual that will show your future teammates how they can work best with you.


This is a personal manual, but while youâ€™re filling it out, try to share as much as you are comfortable with. The main intention here is to raise the importance of transparency and hopefully make your team experience more fun and productive. Good luck with getting to know each other in your team. A functional team is a humble and transparent team.
